ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Percussion Bonus for Selos Broken
ygData.msgSnippet: whats worse is that they stated that they re not fixing it till next patch, they re not putting in an emergency patch. So not only is selos busted, but all the
ygData.messageBody:
whats worse is that they stated that they're not fixing it till next patch,
they're not putting in an emergency patch. So not only is selos busted, but
all the people trying to root/snare better have lotsa tanks around or
they're in trouble when root busts after a nuke. Hmm selos is not the only
busted thing. Come on Verant, make an emergency patch, i cant run around
slow for a week 8(

Minkin



Unfortunately we broke the bard drums with this patch. That's already fixed
and ready to go in with the next patch.
We understand the effects of not having drum bonuses for bard movement songs
(and that is the only thing that appears to have been affected).

Again, we're sorry about the error. We will have it fixed with the next
patch.

But, honestly, if this is the only thing that needs to be changed, we will
probably not be putting up an emergency patch to fix it.

Alan


-----Original Message-----
From: Mott, Mike J. [mailto:mike.j.mott@...]
Sent: January 10, 2001 8:55 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Percussion Bonus for Selos Broken


I hate being right about something like this :(. I really would
like to know why such a blatant bug on test would be propped to the live
servers.

Also, why is it that i can no longer outrun sow speeds without the
drum? Prepatch I was still faster than SOW without an instrument, now i am a
bit slower.

Lago

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
